Package com.schibsted.security.strongbox.archaius

Strongbox integration for Netflix's Archaius.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    InMemoryPlaintextSecret
    Holds the decrypted secret in-memory.
    InMemoryPlaintextSecretDerived<T>
    A property wrapper that can be used to derive any type of data as property value from an in-memory plaintext secret.
    JustInTimeDecryptedSecret
    Decrypts the secret every time get is called.
    StrongboxConfigurationSource  

Package com.schibsted.security.strongbox.archaius Description

Strongbox integration for Netflix's Archaius. Archaius is a dynamic config management framework.
